meanings.definition: The state or quality of being humpy.
meanings.sent1: The humpiness of the camel's back made it easier to ride.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the humpiness of the road as we drove over it.
meanings.sent3: The humpiness of the mattress made it feel like a bumpy ride.
meanings.sent4: The humpiness of the terrain resembled a rollercoaster.
meanings.sent5: The humpiness of the pillow provided extra support for my neck.

meanings.definition: The presence of humps or bumps.
meanings.sent1: The humpiness of the carpet made it difficult to vacuum.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the humpiness of the gravel under my feet.
meanings.sent3: The humpiness of the road caused the car to jolt.
meanings.sent4: The humpiness of the terrain created a challenging hiking path.
meanings.sent5: The humpiness of the cake indicated it was not baked evenly.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a curved or rounded shape.
meanings.sent1: The humpiness of the hill made it perfect for sledding.
meanings.sent2: The humpiness of the clouds added texture to the sky.
meanings.sent3: The humpiness of the balloon made it difficult to tie a string around.
meanings.sent4: The humpiness of the sculpture gave it a unique appearance.
meanings.sent5: The humpiness of the pumpkin made it ideal for carving.
